001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.input;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.TableFilter;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.insertion.TableInsertion;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
007import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
008import org.openqa.selenium.By;
009
010import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
011
012/**
013 * Provides service-level methods for interacting with input UI components.
014 *
015 * <p>This interface defines operations for inserting, clearing, retrieving values,
016 * and verifying the state of input fields, delegating the actual interactions
017 * to specific implementations based on the configured {@link InputComponentType}.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021public interface InputService extends Insertion, TableInsertion, TableFilter {
022
023   InputComponentType DEFAULT_TYPE = getDefaultType();
024
025   /**
026    * Retrieves the default input component type from the configuration.
027    *
028    * @return The default InputComponentType.
029    */
030   public static InputComponentType getDefaultType() {
031      try {
032         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(InputComponentType.class,
033               getUiConfig().inputDefaultType(),
034               getUiConfig().projectPackages());
035      } catch (Exception ignored) {
036         return null;
037      }
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Inserts a given value into a specified container element using the default input component type.
042    *
043    * @param container The SmartWebElement container where the value will be inserted.
044    * @param value     The value to be inserted.
045    */
046   default void insert(SmartWebElement container, String value) {
047      insert(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, value);
048   }
049
050   /**
051    * Inserts a given value into a specified container element, considering a specific input component type.
052    *
053    * @param componentType The type of the input component.
054    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container where the value will be inserted.
055    * @param value         The value to be inserted.
056    */
057   void insert(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String value);
058
059   /**
060    * Inserts a given value into a specified container element identified by a label
061    * using the default input component type.
062    *
063    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container where the value will be inserted.
064    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
065    * @param value           The value to be inserted.
066    */
067   default void insert(SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel, String value) {
068      insert(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, inputFieldLabel, value);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Inserts a given value into a specified container element identified by a label, considering a specific input
073    * component type.
074    *
075    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
076    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container where the value will be inserted.
077    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
078    * @param value           The value to be inserted.
079    */
080   void insert(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel, String value);
081
082   /**
083    * Inserts a given value into an input field identified by a label
084    * using the default input component type.
085    *
086    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
087    * @param value           The value to be inserted.
088    */
089   default void insert(String inputFieldLabel, String value) {
090      insert(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldLabel, value);
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Inserts a given value into an input field identified by a label, considering a specific input component type.
095    *
096    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
097    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
098    * @param value           The value to be inserted.
099    */
100   void insert(InputComponentType componentType, String inputFieldLabel, String value);
101
102   /**
103    * Inserts a given value into an input field located using a By locator
104    * using the default input component type.
105    *
106    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container.
107    * @param value                      The value to be inserted.
108    */
109   default void insert(By inputFieldContainerLocator, String value) {
110      insert(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldContainerLocator, value);
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Inserts a given value into an input field located using a By locator, considering a specific input component type.
115    *
116    * @param componentType              The type of the input component.
117    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container.
118    * @param value                      The value to be inserted.
119    */
120   void insert(InputComponentType componentType, By inputFieldContainerLocator, String value);
121
122   /**
123    * Clears the value from a specified container element using the default input component type.
124    *
125    * @param container The SmartWebElement container to be cleared.
126    */
127   default void clear(SmartWebElement container) {
128      clear(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
129   }
130
131   /**
132    * Clears the value from a specified container element, considering a specific input component type.
133    *
134    * @param componentType The type of the input component.
135    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container to be cleared.
136    */
137   void clear(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
138
139   /**
140    * Clears the value from a specified container element identified by a label
141    * using the default input component type.
142    *
143    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container to be cleared.
144    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
145    */
146   default void clear(SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel) {
147      clear(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, inputFieldLabel);
148   }
149
150   /**
151    * Clears the value from a specified container element identified by a label,
152    * considering a specific input component type.
153    *
154    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
155    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container to be cleared.
156    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
157    */
158   void clear(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel);
159
160   /**
161    * Clears the value from an input field identified by a label using the default input component type.
162    *
163    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field to be cleared.
164    */
165   default void clear(String inputFieldLabel) {
166      clear(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldLabel);
167   }
168
169   /**
170    * Clears the value from an input field identified by a label, considering a specific input component type.
171    *
172    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
173    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field to be cleared.
174    */
175   void clear(InputComponentType componentType, String inputFieldLabel);
176
177   /**
178    * Clears the value from an input field located using a By locator
179    * using the default input component type.
180    *
181    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container to be cleared.
182    */
183   default void clear(By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
184      clear(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldContainerLocator);
185   }
186
187   /**
188    * Clears the value from an input field located using a By locator,
189    * considering a specific input component type.
190    *
191    * @param componentType              The type of the input component.
192    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container to be cleared.
193    */
194   void clear(InputComponentType componentType, By inputFieldContainerLocator);
195
196   /**
197    * Retrieves the value from a specified container element
198    * using the default input component type.
199    *
200    * @param container The SmartWebElement container from which the value will be retrieved.
201    * @return The value from the specified container.
202    */
203   default String getValue(SmartWebElement container) {
204      return getValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
205   }
206
207   /**
208    * Retrieves the value from a specified container element, considering a specific input component type.
209    *
210    * @param componentType The type of the input component.
211    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container from which the value will be retrieved.
212    * @return The value from the specified container.
213    */
214   String getValue(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
215
216   /**
217    * Retrieves the value from a specified container element identified by a label
218    * using the default input component type.
219    *
220    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container from which the value will be retrieved.
221    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
222    * @return The value from the specified container.
223    */
224   default String getValue(SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel) {
225      return getValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, inputFieldLabel);
226   }
227
228   /**
229    * Retrieves the value from a specified container element identified by a label,
230    * considering a specific input component type.
231    *
232    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
233    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container from which the value will be retrieved.
234    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
235    * @return The value from the specified container.
236    */
237   String getValue(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel);
238
239   /**
240    * Retrieves the value from an input field identified by a label
241    * using the default input component type.
242    *
243    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field from which the value will be retrieved.
244    * @return The value from the specified input field.
245    */
246   default String getValue(String inputFieldLabel) {
247      return getValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldLabel);
248   }
249
250   /**
251    * Retrieves the value from an input field identified by a label,
252    * considering a specific input component type.
253    *
254    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
255    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field from which the value will be retrieved.
256    * @return The value from the specified input field.
257    */
258   String getValue(InputComponentType componentType, String inputFieldLabel);
259
260   /**
261    * Retrieves the value from an input field located using a By locator
262    * using the default input component type.
263    *
264    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container from which the value will be
265    *                                   retrieved.
266    * @return The value from the specified input field container.
267    */
268   default String getValue(By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
269      return getValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldContainerLocator);
270   }
271
272   /**
273    * Retrieves the value from an input field located using a By locator,
274    * considering a specific input component type.
275    *
276    * @param componentType              The type of the input component.
277    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container from which the value will be
278    *                                   retrieved.
279    * @return The value from the specified input field container.
280    */
281   String getValue(InputComponentType componentType, By inputFieldContainerLocator);
282
283   /**
284    * Checks if the specified container element is enabled using the default input component type.
285    *
286    * @param container The SmartWebElement container to be checked.
287    * @return true if the container is enabled, false otherwise.
288    */
289   default boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container) {
290      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
291   }
292
293   /**
294    * Checks if the specified container element is enabled, considering a specific input component type.
295    *
296    * @param componentType The type of the input component.
297    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container to be checked.
298    * @return true if the container is enabled, false otherwise.
299    */
300   boolean isEnabled(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
301
302   /**
303    * Checks if the specified container element identified by a label is enabled
304    * using the default input component type.
305    *
306    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container to be checked.
307    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
308    * @return true if the container is enabled, false otherwise.
309    */
310   default boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel) {
311      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, inputFieldLabel);
312   }
313
314   /**
315    * Checks if the specified container element identified by a label is enabled,
316    * considering a specific input component type.
317    *
318    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
319    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container to be checked.
320    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
321    * @return true if the container is enabled, false otherwise.
322    */
323   boolean isEnabled(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel);
324
325   /**
326    * Checks if an input field identified by a label is enabled using the default input component type.
327    *
328    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field to be checked.
329    * @return true if the input field is enabled, false otherwise.
330    */
331   default boolean isEnabled(String inputFieldLabel) {
332      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldLabel);
333   }
334
335   /**
336    * Checks if an input field identified by a label is enabled, considering a specific input component type.
337    *
338    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
339    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field to be checked.
340    * @return true if the input field is enabled, false otherwise.
341    */
342   boolean isEnabled(InputComponentType componentType, String inputFieldLabel);
343
344   /**
345    * Checks if an input field located using a By locator is enabled
346    * using the default input component type.
347    *
348    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container to be checked.
349    * @return true if the input field container is enabled, false otherwise.
350    */
351   default boolean isEnabled(By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
352      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldContainerLocator);
353   }
354
355   /**
356    * Checks if an input field located using a By locator is enabled,
357    * considering a specific input component type.
358    *
359    * @param componentType              The type of the input component.
360    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container to be checked.
361    * @return true if the input field container is enabled, false otherwise.
362    */
363   boolean isEnabled(InputComponentType componentType, By inputFieldContainerLocator);
364
365   /**
366    * Retrieves the error message from a specified container element
367    * using the default input component type.
368    *
369    * @param container The SmartWebElement container from which the error message will be retrieved.
370    * @return The error message from the specified container.
371    */
372   default String getErrorMessage(SmartWebElement container) {
373      return getErrorMessage(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
374   }
375
376   /**
377    * Retrieves the error message from a specified container element,
378    * considering a specific input component type.
379    *
380    * @param componentType The type of the input component.
381    * @param container     The SmartWebElement container from which the error message will be retrieved.
382    * @return The error message from the specified container.
383    */
384   String getErrorMessage(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
385
386   /**
387    * Retrieves the error message from a specified container element identified by a label
388    * using the default input component type.
389    *
390    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container from which the error message will be retrieved.
391    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
392    * @return The error message from the specified container.
393    */
394   default String getErrorMessage(SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel) {
395      return getErrorMessage(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, inputFieldLabel);
396   }
397
398   /**
399    * Retrieves the error message from a specified container element identified by a label,
400    * considering a specific input component type.
401    *
402    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
403    * @param container       The SmartWebElement container from which the error message will be retrieved.
404    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field.
405    * @return The error message from the specified container.
406    */
407   String getErrorMessage(InputComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String inputFieldLabel);
408
409   /**
410    * Retrieves the error message from an input field identified by a label
411    * using the default input component type.
412    *
413    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field from which the error message will be retrieved.
414    * @return The error message from the specified input field.
415    */
416   default String getErrorMessage(String inputFieldLabel) {
417      return getErrorMessage(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldLabel);
418   }
419
420   /**
421    * Retrieves the error message from an input field identified by a label,
422    * considering a specific input component type.
423    *
424    * @param componentType   The type of the input component.
425    * @param inputFieldLabel The label of the input field from which the error message will be retrieved.
426    * @return The error message from the specified input field.
427    */
428   String getErrorMessage(InputComponentType componentType, String inputFieldLabel);
429
430   /**
431    * Retrieves the error message from an input field located using a By locator
432    * using the default input component type.
433    *
434    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container from which the error message will
435    *                                   be retrieved.
436    * @return The error message from the specified input field container.
437    */
438   default String getErrorMessage(By inputFieldContainerLocator) {
439      return getErrorMessage(DEFAULT_TYPE, inputFieldContainerLocator);
440   }
441
442   /**
443    * Retrieves the error message from an input field located using a By locator,
444    * considering a specific input component type.
445    *
446    * @param componentType              The type of the input component.
447    * @param inputFieldContainerLocator The By locator for the input field container from which the error message will
448    *                                   be retrieved.
449    * @return The error message from the specified input field container.
450    */
451   String getErrorMessage(InputComponentType componentType, By inputFieldContainerLocator);
452}
